summary: Small grave added to Riverwood and a Memorial for followers on the outskirts of Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff9933][b]Small grave added to Riverwood and a Memorial for followers on the outskirts of Whiterun[/b][/color]



[b]WHY[/b]:

On finishing up Falskaar I was going to roll a new character which meant saying goodbye to both the character I was playing and Serana.

I felt it would be nice to have something in the new game to remember them and other characters and followers that I have adventured in the land of Skyrim with.

[b]WHAT[/b]:

Adds a small grave for previously played Dovahkiin in Riverwood.

A memorial, which can be found on the north-western outskirts of Whiterun, for all those followers who have faithfuly trudged up and down the length of Skyrim while we seek fame and glory.
author: phototext
